rationale: The species occurs over a very large area and although the habitats in which it occurs are threatened by poor watershed and catchment management, logging and clear-felling for agriculture or development, it is unlikely to become extinct in the short term, it is therefore classed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Maxwell, J., Regalado, J. & Allen, D.
